summary: Manages the end‑to‑end training workflow for a large‑scale image generation model, handling dataset creation, model provisioning, forward and backward computation, gradient aggregation, optimizer steps, and checkpoint lifecycle within a distributed training environment.
business_intent: Provide a scalable, production‑ready framework for training state‑of‑the‑art text‑to‑image models, accelerating research and enabling deployment of high‑quality generative AI services.
